page.title: 09Prisons.
page.content: There are three prisons on the island and their names are Camphill, Albany and Parkhurst. The smallest is Camphill and the biggest is Parkhurst. The prisoners usually help with the activities round the prison like growing vegetables. At the main prison there is maximum security and the risk of an escape is remote because there are tv monitors and barbed wire everywhere.There is a hospital in the prison. The prisoners play sport like football, tenniis badminton, squash, running and jumping. They have classes such as art, soft toy making, woodwork, modelling,German, Spanish, French, English and computer studies. There are canteen facilities and prisoners can buy and cook food for themselves.
